apihelp-query+coordinates-description: Returns coordinates o the gien pages.
apihelp-query+coordinates-param-prop: Which addeetional coordinate properties tae return.
apihelp-query+coordinates-param-primary: Whether tae return anly primar coordinates ("primary"), seicontar ("secondary") or baith ("all").
apihelp-query+coordinates-param-distance: Return distance in metres frae the geografical coordinates o every valid result frae the gien coordinates.
Return distance in meters frae the geografical coordinates o every valid result frae the coordinates o this page.
apihelp-query+coordinates-example-1: Get a leet o coordinates o the [[Main Page]]
apihelp-query+geosearch-description: Returns pages haein coordinates that are locatit in a certain aurie.
apihelp-query+geosearch-param-bbox: Boondin box tae rake in: pipe (|) separatit coordinates o tap left an bottom richt corners.
apihelp-query+geosearch-param-page: Teetle o page aroond which tae rake.
apihelp-query+geosearch-param-maxdim: Restrict rake tae objects no lairger nor this, in metres.
apihelp-query+geosearch-param-limit: Maximum nummer o pages tae return.
apihelp-query+geosearch-param-prop: Which addeetional coordinate properties tae return.
apihelp-query+geosearch-param-primary: Whether tae return anly primar coordinates ("primary"), seicontar ("secondary") or baith ("all").
apihelp-query+geosearch-param-debug: Whether debug information should be returned.
apihelp-query+geosearch-example-1: Rake aroond the pynt wi coordinates 37° 47′ 13.1″ N, 122° 23′ 58.84″ W
